translation.title: Five Discourses on Not Detecting Form, Etc.

next.name: Five Discourses on Not Differentiating Form, Etc.

previous.name: Five Discourses on Not Distinguishing Form, Etc.

segments.en: 31–35. Five Discourses on Not Detecting Form, Etc.

segments.pli: “Rūpe kho, vaccha, anupalakkhaṇā … pe … viññāṇe kho, vaccha, anupalakkhaṇā … pe ….
segments.en: “Vaccha, it is because of not detecting form …”

suttaplex.blurb: The wanderer Vacchagotta asks the Buddha why the various speculative views come to be. The Buddha replies that it is because of not discriminating the five aggregates.
suttaplex.translated_title: Five Discourses on Not Detecting Form, Etc.

translations.author: Bhikkhu Sujato
translations.title: Five Discourses on Not Detecting Form, Etc.
